meta.title: VINC Placement | Premier Thailand-Japan Workforce Solutions | Employers & Workers
meta.description: Since 1988, VINC Placement connects Japanese employers with skilled Thai workers. Over 10,000 Thai workers placed in Japanese companies. Find jobs in Japan or hire Thai talent for construction, manufacturing, engineering, and all industries.
meta.keywords: Thai workers Japan, Japan jobs Thailand, Japanese employers Thai workers, Thailand Japan workforce, Japanese blue collar jobs, Thai blue collar workers Japan, workforce deployment Thailand Japan, construction workers Japan, manufacturing workers Japan, industrial workers Japan, engineering recruitment Thailand Japan, international workforce solutions, Japan employment agency, Thai job seekers Japan

about.title: About VINC Placement
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner Since 1988
about.description: Since 1988, VINC Placement has been Thailand's trusted partner for Japanese job placement. We specialize in preparing and placing Thai workers in Japan across all sectors - from blue-collar factory positions to specialized engineering roles. With over 10,000 successful placements and 35 years of experience, we understand both Thai workers' aspirations and Japanese employers' needs.
about.quote: Thai workers bring exceptional skill, dedication, and work ethic to Japanese workplaces. Our mission is to bridge cultures and create opportunities for Thai talent while delivering excellence to Japanese companies across all industries.
about.achievement: Over the past five years alone, VINC has successfully placed more than 10,000 Thai workers in Japanese companies across all sectors - from factory workers to engineering professionals - maintaining our commitment to excellence and cultural integration.
about.expertise_description: We place Thai workers across all job categories, from entry-level positions to specialized professionals. Our expertise spans diverse industries and roles including:

why_choose_items.title: International Experience
why_choose_items.description: Workforce with proven success in diverse global project environments
